com.asdf.ssjava.screens
Class LevelRetryMenu

java.lang.Object
  com.asdf.ssjava.screens.LevelRetryMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
public class LevelRetryMenu
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

Allows the player to retry the failed level, select another level, or exit to the main menu. Shows the score obtained so far. Is displayed when the player dies partway through the level.

Author:
Jeremy Brown, Simon Thompson
